paramInformation.label: Power Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: Choose how often you want your RGBW Dimmer to report power consumption (W) to your controller. NOTE: must be 0, or an increment of 30.

paramInformation.label: Energy Report Threshold
paramInformation.description: Choose how you want your RGBW Dimmer to report energy use (kWh) to your hub. The number entered as value corresponds to decimal values in energy useage change. So if 10 is entered by default, the RGBW Dimmer will report any change in energy use over 0.1 kWh. Energy reports are sent in t least 30-second intervals.

paramInformation.label: Energy Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: Choose how often you want your RGBW Dimmer to report energy (kWh) to your controller. NOTE: must be 0, or an increment of 30

paramInformation.label: RGBW/HSB Wall Switch Mode
paramInformation.description: Choose how switches connected to the input terminals control your LED strip. In the default RGBW mode, each switch connected to each input terminal controls the RGBW chnnels separately (so IN1 for red, IN2 for green, etc.) with a single click for ON/OFF, double click to full brightness, and press-and-hold to dim (momentary switches only). In the HSB, IN1 controls hue, IN2 - saturation, IN3 - brightness, IN4 - white with single click for last set value or value 0, double click to max value, and press-and-hold to set custom value. Default: RGBW mode

paramInformation.label: Ramp Rate (switch)
paramInformation.description: How long it takes for the dimmer to reach full brightness or turn off when operated from the connected wall switch.

paramInformation.label: Ramp Rate (Z-Wave)
paramInformation.description: How long it takes for the dimmer to reach full brightness or turn off when operated remotely from the Z-Wave hub.

paramInformation.label: Preset Programs
paramInformation.description: Enable one of the preset animated color programs to set the mood with a click.
